visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. The chart should have custom colors for the series and additional configurations for chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes a data series named 'Temperature' that represents the monthly average temperature for a year. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The chart also includes custom colors for the series and additional configurations such as chart margins, background color, and legend settings to improve the overall appearance and functionality of the chart.
